message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.MM. 

The paper deals with improving statistical machine translation of image descriptions using image retrieval and captioning. This involves the use of convolutional neural networks for computing image similarities. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.CL (Computation and Language) and cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also involves information retrieval techniques, which could place it in the cs.IR (Information Retrieval) sub-category. Additionally, the use of neural networks could place it in the cs.LG (Machine Learning) sub-category, and the use of multimodal data could place it in the cs.MM (Multimedia) sub-category.
